attributes.action: Change the unfair new car road tax rules
attributes.additional_details:
Now with the new car tax rules it is easy to get fined for no road tax as you have to purchase road tax or declared (SORN) off road when you purchase a vehicle.
The previous car owner has to cash in the road tax, but looses the cost of the tax for the whole month that the sale took place, but the new owner has to pay road tax for the same month.
Nice scam for the government double road tax for the month that change of owner took place.
attributes.background:
The petition is to enable car road tax to be transferred to the new owner as was the case before the new road tax laws came into force.
This makes purchasing and driving away a vehicle easier
The new road tax is a scam by the government get double road tax for the month change of owner takes place
